member.name: M:Bitcoin.Cli.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary:
The expected sequence of arguments:
1, [network-name] [options] [rpc-command] [rpc-params].
2, [network-name] [options] [api-controller "/" api-command] [api-params].

member.name: M:Bitcoin.Cli.Program.ExceptionToString(System.Exception)
member.summary: Determine both the exception message and any inner exception messages.
member.returns: Returns the exception message plus any inner exceptions.
